headline: HII Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., July 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) announced today that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.35 per share, payable on September 12, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on Aug. 29, 2025. About HII HII is a global, all-domain defense provider. HII’s mission is to deliver the world’s most powerful ships and all-domain solutions in service of the nation, creating the advantage for our customers to protect peace

About HII HII is a global, all-domain defense provider.
